definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Arts and Humanities, we are told, are useless for the making of technological innovation.
sentences.chinese: 我們被教導說藝術與人文對於技術革新是無用的。

sentences.english: He inculcates good manners in his children.
sentences.chinese: 他諄諄教導他的孩子們要懂規矩。

sentences.english: When your parents need to instruct you, respectfully do as you're told.
sentences.chinese: 父母教導我們時，必須恭敬地聽從。

sentences.english: Our culture teaches us that being busy equals happiness.
sentences.chinese: 我們的文化課老師教導我們忙碌即幸福。

sentences.english: Some Scriptures said to focus my ministry and my life on God and God alone.
sentences.chinese: 一些經文教導我要把我的神職和生命致力於上帝一個。

sentences.english: Paul continues on with how speaking in tongues is to be used in worship.
sentences.chinese: 保羅繼續教導在敬拜時怎樣使用方言。

sentences.english: Our instructor told us to keep the room locked .
sentences.chinese: 我們的教導員告訴我們把那間房鎖上。

sentences.english: Young people must be taught to learn the differnces between good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 必須教導青年人學會區分善與惡。

sentences.english: Each division should have a training corps for training squad leaders and platoon officers.
sentences.chinese: 一個師有教導隊，訓練班長和排幹部。

sentences.english: That's what the apostle Paul taught the church at Colosse.
sentences.chinese: 這正是使徒保羅對歌羅西教會的教導。

sentences.english: Most of us are taught to pay attention to what is said-the words.
sentences.chinese: 我們大部分人被教導去注意所說的話。

sentences.english: Parents should teach their kids not to have itchy fin- gers .
sentences.chinese: 父母應該教導孩子不可有偷竊行爲。

sentences.english: He was taught by his father to never let non-humans get the better of him in life.
sentences.chinese: 他的父親教導他，這輩子千萬不要輸給非人類種族。

sentences.english: The boy scouts are taught to do a good deed a day.
sentences.chinese: 這些童子軍被教導要日行一善。

sentences.english: We will have only the barebones ones we need on board to prepare for the teaching process.
sentences.chinese: 我們只需要一些骨幹人員去飛船上爲教導進程做準備。

sentences.english: For who hath known the mind of the Lord, that he may instruct him?
sentences.chinese: 誰曾知道主的心去教導他呢。

definition: to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to cultivate/to breed/to foster/to nurture/to educate/to groom (for a position)/education/fostering/culture (biology)
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
